title: Asmi
description: Asmi—her world she finds teetering on the edge of change, not once, not twice but again and yet again. Situations force her to yield, to face up, or at times to suffer in silence. She finds herself married to Punit who promises her one thing— “I won’t ever love you.” She ends up living a lie, and truthfully so…UNTIL...
author: Anita S.J.
